abstract: The deal to acquire Barclays Global Investors for around $13.5 billion would create an asset management giant.
snippet: The deal to acquire Barclays Global Investors for around $13.5 billion would create an asset management giant.
lead_paragraph: BlackRock said Thursday night that it had agreed to buy Barclays Global Investors from the British banking giant Barclays for about $13.5 billion in one of the largest deals in the money management industry, creating a juggernaut with nearly $3 trillion in assets.

headline.main: BlackRock to Acquire Stake in Barclays Unit
headline.print_headline: BlackRock to Acquire Barclays Investment Unit

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
